text: Chɨn Bɨawl ak muk okok mɨdɨl, ne bɨ jel gup ak nopun. Anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, binɨb kɨli Bɨawl ak nop gos kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨl nɨgɨnɨgel agɨl, chɨn kɨlop kɨles gɨl agɨl gon, gos tɨmud nab kɨlop ak pag yɨkaŋ. Chɨn bɨ tay tek mɨdobun ak, God ne nɨgtep gup. Pen abe anɨgɨl gos nepin, nɨbi gos pal ak teplep won ak nɨg mɨdɨl, chɨn bɨ tay tek mɨdobun ak nɨgtep gɨpɨm.
